ValidationRule.description: If "Lead Status" is "Sales Qualified," the qualification criteria fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales Qualified Lead"), IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF( CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Validation"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), OR( ( ISPICKVAL(Do_we_understand_the_customer_s_buying_p__c, "")), ( ISPICKVAL(Speaking_with_someone_with_influence__c, "")), ( ISPICKVAL(Clear_interest_in_the_next_step__c, "")), ( ISPICKVAL(Are_there_clear_red_flags__c, "")), ( ISBLANK(Qualification_Debrief__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complete Qualification Criteria fields for Sales Qualified Leads
